description:
Hypnosis for Poker inner game mastery Guided Hypnosis was created to help you achieve your goals by simulating a private hypnosis session with me.

This hypnosis course will help you Learn why everyone knows Poker is not just a game of skill and a sprinkling of good luck but a mental game and a game of self control. Hypnosis will help you improve your inner game because hypnosis will help to program your mind to become more aware of your opponents body language so much so that you will begin to notice little micro movements a facial expressions, that will allow you get some inside information on the cards they are holding.

At the same time you will be programming you mind to be calm under pressure and not give anything away if you have a great hand of poker or are bluffing with a poor poker hand.

You will also become more intuitive knowing when to hold on to your poker hand or fold the poker hand you have, at the same time your card counting skills will improve just as though you have a photographic memory.

The added bonus section in this course will further improve your poker playing skills with a hypnosis session for being more assertive and a hypnosis session for having a perfect memory.

Also I have added in the bonus section a technique called EFT that will help you to overcome any negative emotions such as feeling anxious while playing poker.

I will also teach you a secret trigger to feel good any time that you can use without anyone realizing as you play poker.

in this course Hypnosis for Poker inner game mastery Guided Hypnosis 

1. You will begin by creating an image in your mind of what you want so that you will know where you are going and how you will feel as master poker player

2. Learn a secret feel good trigger that will help you through any bad times or set backs on your way.

3. Learn how your mind and body work together with some fun but important lessons that will improve the results of this hypnotherapy session.

4. Learn how you naturally resist changes even changes that can be very good for you

5. Learn just how powerful words can be and their effect on you physically even if they are only self talk.

6. Learn who can and cannot be hypnotized

7. Learn how you can feel amazing any time you want to

8.  Hypnosis course bonus section

with extra hypnosis sessions

Being more assertive Hypnosis session

Perfect memory and recall Hypnosis session

How to use and apply EFT in the bonus section an amazingly powerful technique that can eliminate any limiting bad feelings that have been stopping you from feeling great

All Files and videos are downloadable for easier access
title: Hypnosis for Poker inner game mastery Guided Hypnosis
